data.eml:eml: Two new species of the Simulium (Simulium) tuberosum species-group (Diptera: Simuliidae) from Palawan, the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Takaoka, Hiroyuki, Tenedero, Victor F. (2019): Two new species of the Simulium (Simulium) tuberosum species-group (Diptera: Simuliidae) from Palawan, the Philippines. Zootaxa 4568 (2): 383-393, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4568.2.12
